Preface: I have heard that when Ma Teng entered China,
The sound of his teachings was first spread to the land of the Han people.
As the years passed through the Tang Dynasty,
The Indian scriptures were fully translated into the ocean of the Buddhist canon.
Moreover, in the reign of our Xuanzong Emperor, the ruler of the world,
In the eighteenth year of the Kaiyuan era, the year Gengwu,

It was called the Kaiyuan Catalog of the Buddhist Canon.
It included the sutras, vinaya, and treatises of both the Mahayana and Hinayana,

To have encountered the prosperous period.
Having received special favor.
Not knowing what to do, the minister now, without measure, peeks into the tube.
